update MM_OVERSEAS_SPONSOR
DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_POST_CODE = #{dealerPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPONSOR_NO = #{sponsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_BRANCH_NO = #{saleBranchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_ORG_CODE = #{saleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_CUST_CODE = #{taxCustCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVISE_NO = #{adviseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SPONSOR_ID = #{sponsorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update MM_OVERSEAS_SPONSOR set DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_POST_CODE = #{dealerPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPONSOR_NO = #{sponsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_BRANCH_NO = #{saleBranchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_ORG_CODE = #{saleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_CUST_CODE = #{taxCustCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADVISE_NO = #{adviseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SPONSOR_ID = #{sponsorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
merge into MM_OVERSEAS_SPONSOR mos using ( select #{dealerNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL} as DEALER_NO FROM dual ) t on (mos.DEALER_NO = t.DEALER_NO) when matched then update
mos.DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.DEALER_POST_CODE = #{dealerPostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.SPONSOR_NO = #{sponsorNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.SALE_BRANCH_NO = #{saleBranchNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.SALE_ORG_CODE = #{saleOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.TAX_CUST_CODE = #{taxCustCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.ADVISE_NO = #{adviseNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mos.REQUEST_ID = #{requestId, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mos.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
when not matched then insert
SPONSOR_ID,
DEALER_NO,
DEALER_NAME,
DEALER_POST_CODE,
SPONSOR_NO,
SALE_BRANCH_NO,
SALE_ORG_CODE,
TAX_CUST_CODE,
ADVISE_NO,
REQUEST_ID,
PROGRAM_ID
